title: Bug 49299 - Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 incorrect cookie name behavior
description: Bug 49299 - The behavior described in Servlet 3.0 ch.7.1.1 regarding custom cookie names affecting URL rewriting is incorrect.
OB: In chapter 7.1.1 of servlet30finalspec.pdf, it is stated that if a web application configures a custom name for its session tracking cookies, the same custom name will also be used as the name of the URI parameter if the session ID is encoded in the URL (assuming URL rewriting is enabled). However, when accessing the page in question, the cookie set is 'MYSESSIONCOOKIE' with the value '658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F' and the URL generated for the 'Reload' link uses the default 'jsessionid': http://localhost:8080/cookiename/index.jsp;jsessionid=658C60E714E9C7C833F4FDA366E0477F4.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Deploy the attached 'cookiename.war' file. 2. Access http://localhost:8080/cookiename/.
